mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fsBoard (bId, bTitle, bWriter, bPassword, bContent) VALUES(fs_bId.nextval, #{bTitle}, #{bWriter}, #{bPassword}, #{bContent})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM fsBoard WHERE bId = #{bId} AND bPassword = #{bPassword}
mapper.select: SELECT S.bId, S.bTitle, S.bWriter, S.bContent, S.bDate, S.bCount FROM (SELECT rownum AS rnum, F.bId, F.bTitle, F.bWriter, F.bContent, F.bDate, F.bCount FROM (SELECT bId, bTitle, bWriter, bContent, bDate, bCount FROM fsBoard ORDER BY bId DESC) F WHERE rownum <= #{lstNum} ) S WHERE S.rnum >= #{firNum}
